content.raw:
I noticed that the behavior of `ReduceVisualToParent` was changed in  214d578, although `ReduceCollisionToParent` was not changed. I think these functions should be very similar.

Perhaps part of the issue is that we have a test for fixed joint reduction with visuals, but not with collisions. I'll make sure to add another test for collisions.
content.html:
I noticed that the behavior of ReduceVisualToParent was changed in 214d578, although ReduceCollisionToParent was not changed. I think these functions should be very similar.

Perhaps part of the issue is that we have a test for fixed joint reduction with visuals, but not with collisions. I'll make sure to add another test for collisions.
